1394680.name: Soul Catcher
1394680.description:
★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★

What a lovely idea, thank you for picking up this pamphlet.

We at Buckthorn Lodge are so glad you are thinking of staying with us. Let's read on and see if you would be interested in having us care for you. You and your loved one will be taken in by the serene forest and quiet hiking trails that run through Buckthorn Mountain.

You can relax by the pool or recharge in one of our multiple spa options. More of a stay in your room and veg out type? You're invited to turn on the TV and browse any of the thousands of channels we have available.
The first two movies charged to the room are on us.

We look forward to your visit to Buckthorn Lodge.

★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★

____________________________________


-Concept-
A Low res horror game 14 years in the making by a team of two, heavily inspired by Sweet Home and the original Resident Evil, Soul Catcher has the player take the role of one of six characters who find themselves in a nightmarish remote mountainside trying to save a loved one from a demon worshiping cult.
Navigate the mansion, solve puzzles and evade the horrors that lurk.

Most importantly, can you save the one you cherish most?

FEATURING

Multiple Endings

Six playable characters

Secret Ending

Hand drawn rotoscope cut-scenes

Dog petting

highlighted.name: Lust is means to an end
